```{r}
nSchools <- 8
school_data <- vector("list", nSchools)

for (i in 1:nSchools) {
  fileName <- paste0("school", i, ".dat")
  print(fileName)
  school_data[[i]] <- read.table(fileName)
}

# Compute sample sizes and sample means for each school
n_i <- sapply(school_data, length)
ybar <- sapply(school_data, mean)
all_data <- unlist(school_data)
N <- length(all_data)
```
